SETTINGS.HINT.shortcut_enabled: Whether or not the Drawing Tools panel can be opened via shortcut. Only works when drawing layer is active.
SETTINGS.HINT.shortcut_key: What key will open the Drawing Tools panel. Can be any valid key recognized by JS Events and will be converted to lower case. This can include non-alphanumeric keys, though it is recommended to not use the modifier keys.
SETTINGS.HINT.shortcut_modifiers: What modifier keys must be held to activate the Drawing Tools shortcut.
SETTINGS.HINT.color_selector_size: The size of the color selector canvas. Minimum 100.
SETTINGS.HINT.dropper_preview_size: The size of the dropper preview window. Minimum 20.
SETTINGS.HINT.dropper_read_radius: The radius of pixels displayed by the dropper preview pixel grid. A radius of 1 will only show the exact pixel hovered. A radius of 3 will show two extra pixels on each side surrounding the center pixel. Minimum 1
SETTINGS.HINT.preset_color_swatches: The color codes of the preset swatches under the color selector. These must be in '#XXXXXX' format and comma separated.
SETTINGS.HINT.recent_color_history: How many recently used colors to track for showing as color swatches.
